key: How do you feel, \n[1]! Did you have fun?
original: How do you feel, \n[1]! Did you have fun?

key: I wish every day is outdoor class!
original: I wish every day is outdoor class!
translation: 我真希望每天都有外出课！

key: Alright, everyone! That's enough for today.
original: Alright, everyone! That's enough for today.
translation: 好了大家！今天就先到这里

key: Just a little bit more, \C[14]Ms. Emmi\C[0]
original: Just a little bit more, \C[14]Ms. Emmi\C[0]
translation: 再玩一会儿嘛, \C[14]埃米小姐\C[0]

key: Don't worry, we have outdoor class every week!
original: Don't worry, we have outdoor class every week!
translation: 没事的，我们每周都有外出课！

key: I'm looking forward to next week's outdoor class!
original: I'm looking forward to next week's outdoor class!
translation: 我已经等不及下周上外出课了！

key: I'm busy, talk to someone else.
original: I'm busy, talk to someone else.

key: Hey! Wanna go and pick some flowers?
original: Hey! Wanna go and pick some flowers?

key: You wanna eat my fist or maybe your ass wants to taste my foot!
original: You wanna eat my fist or maybe your ass wants to taste my foot!
translation: 你是想吃我一拳还是一脚！

key: Find a spot to set your bags down.
original: Find a spot to set your bags down.
translation: 找个地方把背包放一下

key: Oh, you can set the materials down here, \n[1].
original: Oh, you can set the materials down here, \n[1].
translation: 哦你可以把材料放在这，\n[1]

key: Go and set your stuff down so I can explain our activity.
original: Go and set your stuff down so I can explain our activity.
translation: 去把你们的东西都放下，然后来听我讲话

key: Stay away from mushrooms you don't know or that are brightly colored.
original: Stay away from mushrooms you don't know or that are brightly colored.
translation: 离颜色鲜艳的蘑菇远点！小心别吃了中毒！

key: If you are bleeding or bitten by a snake,
original: If you are bleeding or bitten by a snake,
translation: 如果你们受伤了，或是被蛇咬了

key: you can grill mushrooms or roast marshmallows.
original: you can grill mushrooms or roast marshmallows.
translation: 你们可以在这里烤蘑菇或棉花糖吃

key: Think of it as a picnic.
original: Think of it as a picnic.

key: We will return in the afternoon.
original: We will return in the afternoon.

key: There is nothing you can do here yet.
original: There is nothing you can do here yet.
translation: 现在你还什么都做不了

key: Talk with Emmi to end the outdoor class.
original: Talk with Emmi to end the outdoor class.
translation: 去和埃米说话就能结束外出课
